Definition: In this task, you need to write a topic word from the given fact. The topic word must have at least one word overlap with the given fact. The topic word often involves adding a new word from a related concept. In your topic word, use at least one word from the given fact. Topic words with two or more words work best.

Positive Examples.explanation: This is a good topic word, because it contains one overlapping word "pollution".
The word "pesticide" is the overlapping word.

Negative Examples.explanation: This is a bad topic word, because it has no overlapping word with the given fact.
